name: Complex Trading Platform
description: Full quantitative trading system architecture with multiple subsystems

pages.title: System Overview
pages.plantuml:
@startuml System Overview
!theme strategient from ../assets/plantuml/themes

title Trading Platform - High Level

cloud "External Data" as ext
rectangle "Ingestion" as ingest
rectangle "Storage" as store
rectangle "Alpha" as alpha
rectangle "Portfolio" as port
rectangle "Execution" as exec
cloud "Brokers" as broker

ext --> ingest
ingest --> store
store --> alpha
alpha --> port
port --> exec
exec --> broker

@enduml

pages.title: Data Ingestion
pages.plantuml:
@startuml Data Ingestion
!theme strategient from ../assets/plantuml/themes

title Data Ingestion Layer

cloud "Market Data" as market {
    component "Bloomberg" as bloom
    component "Reuters" as reut
    component "IEX" as iex
    component "Polygon" as poly
}

cloud "Alt Data" as alt {
    component "Satellite" as sat
    component "Sentiment" as sent
    component "News" as news
}

rectangle "Feed Handlers" as feeds {
    component "Handler A" as ha
    component "Handler B" as hb
    component "Handler C" as hc
    component "Alt Processor" as ap
}

queue "Raw Queue" as rq
component "Normalizer" as norm
component "Symbol Mapper" as sym
component "Corp Actions" as corp

bloom --> ha
reut --> hb
iex --> hc
poly --> hc
sat --> ap
sent --> ap
news --> ap

ha --> rq
hb --> rq
hc --> rq
ap --> rq

rq --> norm
norm --> sym
sym --> corp

@enduml

pages.title: Data Storage
Alpha Generation
pages.plantuml:
@startuml Alpha Generation
!theme strategient from ../assets/plantuml/themes

title Alpha Generation Pipeline

storage "Feature Store" as fs

rectangle "Traditional Alphas" as trad {
    component "Momentum" as mom
    component "Mean Reversion" as mr
    component "Stat Arb" as stat
    component "Carry" as carry
}

rectangle "ML Alphas" as mlalpha {
    component "XGBoost" as xgb
    component "Transformer" as trans
    component "LSTM" as lstm
    component "GNN" as gnn
}

rectangle "Alt Data Alphas" as altalpha {
    component "NLP Sentiment" as nlp
    component "Satellite" as satimg
    component "Web Traffic" as web
}

component "Alpha Combiner" as comb
component "Signal Decay" as decay
component "Alpha Scaler" as scale

fs --> mom
fs --> mr
fs --> stat
fs --> carry
fs --> xgb
fs --> trans
fs --> lstm
fs --> gnn
fs --> nlp
fs --> satimg
fs --> web

mom --> comb
mr --> comb
stat --> comb
carry --> comb
xgb --> comb
trans --> comb
lstm --> comb
gnn --> comb
nlp --> comb
satimg --> comb
web --> comb

comb --> decay
decay --> scale

@enduml

pages.title: Risk Management
pages.plantuml:
@startuml Risk Management
!theme strategient from ../assets/plantuml/themes

title Risk Management System

rectangle "Pre-Trade" as pre {
    component "Order Validator" as valid
    component "Position Limits" as poslim
    component "Concentration" as conc
    component "Sector Limits" as sect
}

rectangle "Real-Time" as rt {
    component "P&L Monitor" as pnl
    component "Drawdown Alert" as dd
    component "Volatility" as vol
    component "Greeks" as greeks
}

rectangle "Analytics" as anal {
    component "VaR Calculator" as var
    component "Stress Test" as stress
    component "Scenario" as scen
    component "Correlation" as corr
}

rectangle "Controls" as ctrl {
    component "Kill Switch" as kill
    component "Margin Manager" as margin
    component "Exposure Limits" as exp
}

valid --> pnl
poslim --> dd
conc --> vol
sect --> greeks

pnl --> var
dd --> stress
vol --> scen
greeks --> corr

var --> kill
stress --> margin
scen --> exp
corr --> exp

@enduml

pages.title: Portfolio Construction
pages.plantuml:
@startuml Portfolio Construction
!theme strategient from ../assets/plantuml/themes

title Portfolio Construction & Optimization

component "Alpha Signals" as alpha
component "Risk Model" as risk

rectangle "Universe" as univ {
    component "Universe Filter" as filter
    component "Liquidity Screen" as liq
    component "Borrowability" as borrow
}

rectangle "Optimization" as opt {
    component "Mean-Variance" as mv
    component "Black-Litterman" as bl
    component "Risk Parity" as rp
    component "Factor Neutral" as fn
}

rectangle "Constraints" as con {
    component "Position Limits" as pos
    component "Sector Bounds" as sect
    component "Turnover" as turn
    component "Transaction Cost" as tcost
}

component "Rebalancer" as reb
component "Tax Lot Optimizer" as tax
component "Target Portfolio" as target

alpha --> filter
risk --> filter
filter --> liq
liq --> borrow

borrow --> mv
borrow --> bl
borrow --> rp
borrow --> fn

mv --> pos
bl --> pos
rp --> pos
fn --> pos

pos --> sect
sect --> turn
turn --> tcost

tcost --> reb
reb --> tax
tax --> target

@enduml

pages.title: Execution Layer
pages.plantuml:
@startuml Execution Layer
!theme strategient from ../assets/plantuml/themes

title Order Execution System

component "Target Portfolio" as target

rectangle "Order Management" as oms {
    component "Order Manager" as om
    component "Order Validator" as valid
    component "Compliance" as comp
    queue "Order Queue" as oq
}

rectangle "Smart Router" as router {
    component "Venue Selector" as venue
    component "Cost Estimator" as cost
    component "Latency Optimizer" as lat
}

rectangle "Algorithms" as algos {
    component "TWAP" as twap
    component "VWAP" as vwap
    component "POV" as pov
    component "IS" as is
    component "Arrival Price" as arrival
    component "Dark Aggregator" as dark
}

rectangle "Connectivity" as conn {
    component "FIX Gateway A" as fixa
    component "FIX Gateway B" as fixb
    component "REST API" as rest
    component "WebSocket" as ws
}

target --> om
om --> valid
valid --> comp
comp --> oq

oq --> venue
venue --> cost
cost --> lat

lat --> twap
lat --> vwap
lat --> pov
lat --> is
lat --> arrival
lat --> dark

twap --> fixa
vwap --> fixa
pov --> fixb
is --> fixb
arrival --> rest
dark --> ws

@enduml

pages.title: Full Architecture
pages.plantuml:
@startuml Full Architecture
!theme strategient from ../assets/plantuml/themes

title Complete Trading Platform

' Data Sources
cloud "Bloomberg" as bloom
cloud "Reuters" as reut
cloud "Alt Data" as alt

' Ingestion
rectangle "Ingestion" as ing {
    component "Feed A" as fa
    component "Feed B" as fb
    component "Alt Proc" as ap
    queue "Queue" as q
    component "Normalizer" as norm
}

' Storage
rectangle "Storage" as stor {
    database "Tick DB" as tick
    database "OHLCV" as ohlcv
    database "Alt Lake" as lake
    storage "Features" as feat
}

' Alpha
rectangle "Alpha" as alph {
    component "Momentum" as mom
    component "ML Model" as ml
    component "Combiner" as comb
}

' Risk
rectangle "Risk" as risk {
    component "Pre-Trade" as pre
    component "Real-Time" as rt
    component "VaR" as var
}

' Portfolio
rectangle "Portfolio" as port {
    component "Optimizer" as opt
    component "Constraints" as con
    component "Rebalancer" as reb
}

' Execution
rectangle "Execution" as exec {
    component "OMS" as oms
    component "Algos" as algo
    component "Router" as rout
}

' Brokers
cloud "Broker A" as bra
cloud "Broker B" as brb

' Monitoring
rectangle "Monitoring" as mon {
    component "P&L" as pnl
    component "Analytics" as anal
    component "Alerts" as alert
}

' Connections
bloom --> fa
reut --> fb
alt --> ap

fa --> q
fb --> q
ap --> q
q --> norm

norm --> tick
norm --> ohlcv
ap --> lake

tick --> feat
ohlcv --> feat
lake --> feat

feat --> mom
feat --> ml
mom --> comb
ml --> comb

comb --> pre
pre --> opt
rt --> opt
var --> con

opt --> con
con --> reb

reb --> oms
oms --> algo
algo --> rout

rout --> bra
rout --> brb

bra --> pnl
brb --> pnl
pnl --> anal
anal --> alert
alert --> rt

@enduml
